channel.title: Using Crane on Documentation for Konveyor projects
channel.description: Recent content in Using Crane on Documentation for Konveyor projects

item.title: Step One: Export
item.description: The first step of the cluster migration process is exporting resources from a source cluster of any namespace to be input for the subsequent commands. All of the following export commands will output the contents of the foo namespace into a local export directory with the context demo defined in KUBECONFIG. crane export -n foo -e export --context demo cat << EOF >> conf.yaml namespace: foo export-dir: export context: demo EOF crane export -c conf.
